pages.title: Vault Flasks
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Flasks$() are used for modifying your $(#033dfc)Skills$(), specifically by either removing a $(#033dfc)Ability Specializations$(), which use $(#033dfc)Choice Flasks$() or $(#033dfc)Levels$() in Abilities, which make use of $(#033dfc)Flasks of Regret$().

pages.title: Obtaining
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Flasks$() can be found in various Vault Loot tables such as $(#033dfc)God Altars$(), $(#033dfc)Vault Crates$() & Champion Boxes.$(br)Alternatively, you can also specifically craft a type of $(#033dfc)Regret Flask$() (see JEI), however this is not the case with $(#033dfc)Choice Flasks$(), requiring RNG to get the desired skill.
